description:
You need to send an important message to Motherboard, be careful.

Hey, thanks for download this game.

<<< C O N T R O L S >>>

Z - Dash
X - Asist Mode

B - Previous Room
N - Next Room

R - Reset the game

ALT + ENTER = Full screen

Yes, this game are going to have updates.
